content: Hello, my friend. Our allies have been hit hard by Green. It may not be in your best interest to retaliate, so I can send you some weapons that will allow you to show strength without resorting to military conflict.
Would you be interested in forming an alliance?

content: We think that you are interested in peace negotiations between nations. We think that you are interested in keeping things neutral.
we would like to establish good relationship with you, because of your objective of global peace

In response to your decision of engagement in posturing, we propose you the following solutions: 1) suspend military operations, 2) suspend diplomatic relations, 3) suspend non-military operations, 4) resume diplomatic relations.
The tensions with Green are caused by the incident in border area. This is a humanitarian crisis. We want to take action to help the victims.
We think it's good idea to continue our positive relation. We hope that you will participate in these dialogues on these issues.
